name: Scorpion Gauntlet
desc: On Hit: You regain 1 Consumable charge to a weapon, support item, or technique. This effect only happens if you hit an enemy, once per attack.

name: Gunblade
desc: You can (3) VOLLEY with the ranged profile, or (5) FIGHT with the melee profile. 1/turn when you attack with one of the profiles, you can spend 2 mana to also attack with the other profile.

name: Masamune
desc: Whenever you roll a 1 on any damage dice with this weapon, you take 1 stress and roll that die again. This effect can trigger on the same die multiple times. It’s not optional.

name: Throatcutter
desc: You can (5) FIGHT with this weapon during PHASE 3: SKIRMISH.

name: Longinus
desc: This weapon gains PIERCING if attacking a target at the weapon’s maximum reach.

name: Wraith Chain
desc: You can attack with this weapon as a Minor Action during any phase. You can only attack with this weapon 1/turn, and if you attack with it as a Minor Action, it deals no damage.\nOn Hit: If the target is Pulled adjacent to you, you can automatically succeed on a (5) GRAPPLE against them.\n

name: Rageblade
desc: If you are BLOODIED when you attack with this weapon, you ignore the INACCURATE tag.

name: Mantis Blade
desc: When you attack with this weapon, you can attack two different targets at the same time.

name: Sinbow
desc: On Hit: If you are BREAKING, this weapon deals bonus damage equal to half your Stress.

name: Vine Whip
desc: On crit: You can slide the target 3 spaces.

name: Gravedigger`s Shovel
desc: Deals double damage to objects, terrain, and summons. You can attack these targets as a Minor Action.

name: Widowmaker
desc: On Crit: The damage from this weapon is Armor Piercing.

name: Edge of Darkness
desc: 1/turn when you defeat, wound, or overstress an enemy with this weapon, you gain 3 temp HP and this weapon’s damage increases by +1, to a maximum of +6. This extra damage lasts until you take a long rest.

name: Sewing Needle
desc: On Hit: If the target is BLOODIED, you can spend 1 mana to make them IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn. Any BLOODIED enemies of your choice adjacent to the target are SLOWED until the end of their next turn if you spend the mana.

name: Displacer Rod
desc: This weapon’s damage is equal to the distance between you and the target, to a maximum of [20 Force].

name: Gert`s Backbone
desc: As a Minor Action you can deploy this weapon as a Summon in a free space within Scope. (Size 1, 10 HP, Dodge/A-def 10). You can (5) FIGHT with this weapon while it is summoned, but draw line of sight and reach from the summon. If the weapon is thrown while summoned, the summon can pick it up for you. The summon can use the OPPORTUNITY ATTACK reaction, using the weapon’s stats. \nIf this summon is destroyed, so is the weapon, and vice versa. You can return the summon to a weapon as a Minor Action if it is within Scope, but any damage it has taken remains until you rest.

name: Holy Avenger
desc: This weapon gains the Accurate tag when it’s not your turn.\nOn Crit: You or an ally within [RANGE 5] can end a condition or clear all DISCORD on themselves.

name: Solar Flare
desc: +1 ACC on the attack if the target has Discord.

name: White Wind
desc: On Hit: Target is SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Astral Barrage
desc: Instead of attacking normally, you can choose to attack every MARKED enemy within the weapon’s range. You must consume the marks, and you take [1 Stress] for every additional target attacked beyond the first.

name: Heartseeker
desc: If you consume a mark, this weapon gains Piercing for the attack.

name: Flash Step Dagger
desc: On Hit: You can teleport to a free space adjacent to the target.

name: Apex Weapon
desc: On Hit: You can successfully (5) GRAPPLE the target. They take [1 Piercing Physical] at the start of each of their turns while remaining (5) GRAPPLEd by you.

name: Wit
desc: On Hit: The target is DAZED until the end of their next turn and MARKED.

name: Experimental Weapon(Melee)
desc:
When this weapon is created and during a Long Rest, you can choose to change the following:
•Range: Reach 1 (Counts as melee weapon) or Range 10 (counts as ranged weapon)
•Damage Type: Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force
After you use this weapon roll a d6. On a 4-6 the weapon malfunctions and must be RELOADED before being used again.

name: Experimental Weapon(Ranged)
desc:
When this weapon is created and during a Long Rest, you can choose to change the following:
•        Range: Reach 1 (Counts as melee weapon) or Range 10 (counts as ranged weapon)
•        Damage Type: Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force
After you use this weapon roll a d6. On a 4-6 the weapon malfunctions and must be RELOADED before being used again.

name: Improved Experimental Weapon(Melee)
desc:
When this weapon is created and during a Long Rest, you can choose to change the following:
•        Range: Reach 1 (Counts as melee weapon) or Range 10 (counts as ranged weapon)
•        Damage Type: Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force
When you create your experimental weapon or during a Long Rest, choose two of the following improvements for your weapon.
Tags (Can be Chosen Twice). Your Experimental weapon gains one of the following tags: Accurate, Aetheric, Arcing, Push 1, Reliable 2, Thrown 5.
Area Pattern. When you attack with your experimental weapon, you can choose to make it one of the following AOEs instead of a normal attack. If you do so, you roll twice to determine malfunction and keep the highest result.
Ranged Weapon: Line 8, or Blast 1 with weapon’s range.
Melee Weapon: Burst 1 or Close Blast 1

After you use this weapon roll a d6. On a 5-6 the weapon malfunctions and must be RELOADED before being used again.

name: Improved Experimental Weapon(Ranged)
desc:
When this weapon is created and during a Long Rest, you can choose to change the following:
•        Range: Reach 1 (Counts as melee weapon) or Range 10 (counts as ranged weapon)
•        Damage Type: Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force
When you create your experimental weapon or during a Long Rest, choose two of the following improvements for your weapon.
Tags (Can be Chosen Twice). Your Experimental weapon gains one of the following tags: Accurate, Aetheric, Arcing, Push 1, Reliable 2, Thrown 5.
Area Pattern. When you attack with your experimental weapon, you can choose to make it one of the following AOEs instead of a normal attack. If you do so, you roll twice to determine malfunction and keep the highest result.
Ranged Weapon: Line 8, or Blast 1 with weapon’s range.
Melee Weapon: Burst 1 or Close Blast 1

After you use this weapon roll a d6. On a 5-6 the weapon malfunctions and must be RELOADED before being used again.

name: Perfect Experimental Weapon(Melee)
desc:
When this weapon is created and during a Long Rest, you can choose to change the following:
•        Range: Reach 1 (Counts as melee weapon) or Range 10 (counts as ranged weapon)
•        Damage Type: Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force
When you create your experimental weapon or during a Long Rest, choose two of the following improvements for your weapon.
Tags (Can be Chosen Twice). Your Experimental weapon gains one of the following tags: Accurate, Aetheric, Arcing, Push 1, Reliable 2, Thrown 5.
Area Pattern. When you attack with your experimental weapon, you can choose to make it one of the following AOEs instead of a normal attack. If you do so, you roll twice to determine malfunction and keep the highest result.
Ranged Weapon: Line 8, or Blast 1 with weapon’s range.
Melee Weapon: Burst 1 or Close Blast 1
When you create your experimental weapon or during a Long Rest, choose one of the following improvements to your weapon.
• Increased Range. If your weapon is melee, it gains +1 reach. If it is ranged, it gains +5 range.
• Increased Damage. Your weapon’s damage becomes 1d6+3 
• Punch Through. Your weapon gains Piercing.  
After you use this weapon roll a d6. On a 6 the weapon malfunctions and must be RELOADED before being used again.

name: Perfect Experimental Weapon(Ranged)
desc:
When this weapon is created and during a Long Rest, you can choose to change the following:
•        Range: Reach 1 (Counts as melee weapon) or Range 10 (counts as ranged weapon)
•        Damage Type: Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force
When you create your experimental weapon or during a Long Rest, choose two of the following improvements for your weapon.
Tags (Can be Chosen Twice). Your Experimental weapon gains one of the following tags: Accurate, Aetheric, Arcing, Push 1, Reliable 2, Thrown 5.
Area Pattern. When you attack with your experimental weapon, you can choose to make it one of the following AOEs instead of a normal attack. If you do so, you roll twice to determine malfunction and keep the highest result.
Ranged Weapon: Line 8, or Blast 1 with weapon’s range.
Melee Weapon: Burst 1 or Close Blast 1
When you create your experimental weapon or during a Long Rest, choose one of the following improvements to your weapon.
• Increased Range. If your weapon is melee, it gains +1 reach. If it is ranged, it gains +5 range.
• Increased Damage. Your weapon’s damage becomes 1d6+3 
• Punch Through. Your weapon gains Piercing.  
After you use this weapon roll a d6. On a 6 the weapon malfunctions and must be RELOADED before being used again.

name: Chakram
desc: When thrown, this weapon gains ARCING and deals +1 damage for every space traveled beyond range 1.

name: Wolf Claws
desc: On Damage: You can Shift a number of spaces equal to the total damage. If you end this movement next to a different enemy than the one you attacked, you can deal [1 Piercing Physical] to them.

name: Abyssal Scepter
desc: On Hit: You can spend 1 mana to create a Burst 2 area around the target. All characters in the area are Pulled to the closest free space adjacent to the target.

name: Greatoak Mauler
desc: On Hit: All enemies adjacent to you take physical damage equal to the highest d6 roll for this weapon’s damage.

name: Frontline
desc: On Crit: you can teleport one willing ally within your Scope up to 5 spaces.
